text: Please explain your report.  What problem are you claiming to address/solve?

Hi,

When configuring apr (HEAD) and httpd 2.3 (HEAD) config.layout file
is sourced and temporary file config.pld created.

On MSYS/MinGW the contents of the config.pld is wrong, which leads
to warnings during ./configure, eg.:

   ./configure: ./config.pld: line 26: unexpected EOF while 
   looking for matching `''

Probably sed commands from apr_common.m4 file used to source 
config.layout are outdated (obfuscated for sure :).

My patch cleares sed commands to:

1. Extract correct <Layout> </Layout> section:

 "/^[ 	]*<[lL]ayout[ 	]*$LAYOUT[ 	]*>/,/^[	]*<\/[lL]ayout>/ !d"

2. Strip <Layout> and </Layout> lines:

 "/^[	]*<\/*[lL]ayout/ d"

3. Follow with the rest of commands (strip leading and intertim white-spaces, quote variables etc)

Regards,
Przemek
